CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The photovoltaic properties of the resulting polymers were investigated with a conventional device structure of ITO / PEDOT : PSS ( 40 nm ) / polym e r : P C 7^1 B M ( 8^0 n m ) / p o l y [ ( 9 , 9 -b i s ( 3 ′ -( N , Ndimethylamino)propyl)-2,7-fluorene)-alt-2,7-(9,9-dioctylfluorene) ] ( PFN ) ( 5 nm ) / Al ( 100 nm ) , here a thin layer of PFN was employed as the cathode interlayer since it can improve the electron extraction.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PEDOT |
| PSS |
| polymer |
| P C 7^1 B M |
| poly |
| (9,9-bis(3′-(N,N-dimethylamino)propyl)-2,7-fluorene)-alt-2,7-(9,9-dioctylfluorene) |
| PFN |
| Al |

Note:

* PEDOT and PSS are not explicitly mentioned as materials, but they are components of the device structure and are commonly used materials in organic electronics.
* The polymer used in the device structure is not specified, so it is listed as "polymer" without quotes.
* P C 7^1 B M is a specific type of polymer, so it is listed as a separate material.
* The long chemical name of the material in the parentheses is not a separate material, but rather a description of the structure of the polymer. Therefore, it is not included in the list of materials.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Here's the updated table with the valid entities that clearly refer to material names:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PEDOT |
| PSS |
| PFN |
| Al |

The following entities were removed from the original list as they do not clearly refer to material names:

* "polymer" (not a specific material name)
* "(9,9-bis(3′-(N,N-dimethylamino)propyl)-2,7-fluorene)-alt-2,7-(9,9-dioctylfluorene)" (a description of the polymer structure, not a material name)
